description: Make this tender beef platter for a simple, flavour-packed centrepiece for your next family barbecue. An easy, breezy recipe that's ready in a flash.
name: Beef Flank Steak With Chimichurri Sauce & Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g Woolworths BBQ Beef Flank Steak With Chimichurri Sauce
160g mixa-mato mini tomatoes, halved or quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Cook beef steak on an oiled barbecue grill according to packet instructions. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 5 minutes. Slice steak and arrange on a platter. Top with tomato and onion. Drizzle with chimichurri sauce from packet and serve.
